thread.section_title: Trade Tested Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trade Tested | www.tradetested.co.nz
thread.title: Peter Togia
thread.title_full: Trade Tested reviewed by Peter Togia

author: Peter Togia
title: Peter Togia
text:
I am very happy with my purchase of the 10 x 9 watt LED lights as well as the service and speed of delivery. I have had a couple of bad experiences with buying online with items not being delivered at all and to be honest I was sceptical that the items (LED light bulbs) were going to be good. I asked around my friends who had bought items from Trade Tested and looked at reviews about the company and almost all of the comments were very good which gave me the confidence to buy.
I will now look to buy from Trade Tested in future as well as add my small endorsement of the company to my social circle and on these review sites.
Thank you again.
